verses.verse: <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H4397>messenger,<s%> and he shall <S%H6437>prepare<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: and the <S%H113>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H1245>seek,<s%> shall <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H1964>temple,<s%> even the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H2655>delight<s%> in: <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he shall <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

But <S%H4310>who<s%> may <S%H3557>abide<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H935>coming?<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> when he <S%H7200>appears?<s%> for he is like a <S%H6884>refiner's<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and like <S%H3526>fullers'<s%> <S%H1287>soap:<s%>

And he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> as a <S%H6884>refiner<s%> and <S%H2891>purifier<s%> of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> and he shall <S%H2891>purify<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H2212>purge<s%> them as <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> that they may <S%H5066>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Then shall the <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> be <S%H6149>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> and as in <S%H6931>former<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And I will <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to you to <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> and I will be a <S%H4116>swift<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against the <S%H3784>sorcerers,<s%> and against the <S%H5003>adulterers,<s%> and against <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H7650>swearers,<s%> and against those that <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H7916>hireling<s%> in his <S%H7939>wages,<s%> the <S%H490>widow,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and that <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> from his right, and <S%H3372>fear<s%> not me, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
For I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I <S%H8138>change<s%> not; therefore you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> are not <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>

Even from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> you are <S%H5493>gone<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from my <S%H2706>ordinances,<s%> and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> them. <S%H7725>Return<s%> to me, and I will <S%H7725>return<s%> to you, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%> But you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherein<s%> shall we <S%H7725>return?<s%>

Will a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6906>rob<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%> Yet you have <S%H6906>robbed<s%> me. But you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherein<s%> have we <S%H6906>robbed<s%> you? In <S%H4643>tithes<s%> and <S%H8641>offerings.<s%>
You are <S%H779>cursed<s%> with a <S%H3994>curse:<s%> for you have <S%H6906>robbed<s%> me, even this <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

<S%H935>Bring<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H214>storehouse,<s%> that there may be <S%H2964>meat<s%> in my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H974>prove<s%> me <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2063>herewith,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> if I will not <S%H6605>open<s%> you the <S%H699>windows<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7324>pour<s%> you out a <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> that there shall not be room <S%H1767>enough<s%> to receive it.

And I will <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> the <S%H398>devourer<s%> for your sakes, and he shall not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6529>fruits<s%> of your <S%H127>ground;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall your <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H7921>cast<s%> her <S%H7921>fruit<s%> before the time in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H833>call<s%> you <S%H833>blessed:<s%> for you shall be a <S%H2656>delightsome<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Your <S%H1697>words<s%> have been <S%H2388>stout<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have we <S%H1696>spoken<s%> so much <S%H5921>against<s%> you?

You have <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H7723>vain<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>God:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1215>profit<s%> is it that we have <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H4931>ordinance,<s%> and that we have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6941>mournfully<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts?<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> we <S%H833>call<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> <S%H833>happy;<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> they that <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> are <S%H1129>set<s%> up; <S%H1571>yes,<s%> they that <S%H974>tempt<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> are even <S%H4422>delivered.<s%>

Then they that <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> often <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7181>listened,<s%> and <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and a <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H2146>remembrance<s%> was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him for them that <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and that <S%H2803>thought<s%> on his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And they shall be mine, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> I <S%H6213>make<s%> up my <S%H5459>jewels;<s%> and I will <S%H2550>spare<s%> them, as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2550>spares<s%> his own <S%H1121>son<s%> that <S%H5647>serves<s%> him.

Then shall you <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H7200>discern<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> him that <S%H5647>serves<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and him that <S%H5647>serves<s%> him not.
